questions.prompt: Which of the following vacation destinations sounds most appealing to you?

choices.name: The Bahamas
choices.description: I want to relax in the sun and sand

choices.name: Yosemite Park
choices.description: I like being out in nature

choices.name: Paris
choices.description: I enjoy indulging in cultural delicassies, art, fine food and wine

choices.name: Thailand
choices.description: When it comes to travel, I seek out new and different people and cultures

choices.name: All of the above
choices.description: I'd be happy just getting out of the house

questions.prompt: What best describes your work style?
Which famous developer do you admire most?
When you run into a bug, you try to fix it by:

choices.name: Giving up and moving on to the next ticket

questions.prompt: The reason you got into development was...

choices.name: To collaborate with others on groundbreaking projects
To gain a sense of fulfillment through problem-solving

questions.prompt: The types of companies that you enjoy working for are...
Which of the following app ideas interests you most?

choices.name: Finance Plus
choices.description: An app to manage your money

choices.name: Travel Companion
choices.description: An app to find the best places to visit while traveling

choices.name: Magic Quest
choices.description: A game app where you progress through a medieval forest

choices.name: Kitty Boop
choices.description: A game where you work to boop other cats

questions.prompt: If I weren't a software developer, I'd:

choices.name: Work as another type of engineer

results.Dog: Your are loyal to your friends, your family, and your company. As a developer your plan is to get into a company early and work your way up. Through hard work and dedication you will achieve longterm success.
results.Bear: You are aggressive about your goals and will stop at nothing to get what you're after. When it comes to work, you expect a lot out of a company, but you give a lot in exchange. Your ultra-focused mindset and driven personality put you on the fast track to achieving new heights quickly.
results.Peacock: You aim to stand out. You don't want to blend in with the crowd, so you make many efforts to ensure that your peers admire your unique approach to life, and software development. Always keen on shiny new technologies, you impress your coworkers regularly by breaking out a new technique.
results.Monkey: You are incredibly agile. Your mind is adept to quick problem-solving and it's something you enjoy about what you do. In any given jungle of code, you can somehow always navigate your way to an efficient and elogant solution.
results.Sloth: You like to take it easy. You enjoy what you do, but you don't want to push yourself too hard. Life's about enjoying the simple things, and sometimes that's sleeping. But, on occasion, you write some code as well.
